Warranty & Support

Product Warranty: For warranty information about this product, please click here

Price: $299.99 - $219.99
(as of Nov 30,2022 11:08:50 UTC – Details)

From the brand

Series E I Office Desk Chair

Series J I Office Desk Chair

Ergonomic Desgin: Big & tall executive office chair has Double layer soft cushion can keep you away from the numbness caused by long sitting.Thickened headrest and backrest fit to the curve of human spine can give you strong support and help you release back pressure.
High-Quality Material: This executive office chair upholstered in high-quality PU leather. It’s a soft, lustrous, durable and water-proof. Comfortable cushion consis of native sponge and PP cotton, soft and resilient.
Flexible Using Style: You can flip the arms up and do things that can’t be done in other chairs, such as playing guitar or sitting cross-legged. You can also put the chair under the desk for saving space by fliping up the arms.
Adjustable Function: The pneumatic seat height adjustment can meets your different needs.Rocking backwards from 90 to 125 degree can relax you in spare time.degree. 360 degree rotation cushion and rolling swivel caster make this desk chair more flexible and convenient.
Assembly and Security: Certified by BIFMA and weight support up to 330 pounds. Besides, It’s easy to assembly, and you will not need to prepare additional tools for the assembly.
Customer Warranty Service: Hbada provides three years warranty that is processed in the most hassle-free way possible. Customer-first is the original aspiration of Hbada.No matter what problems you encounter during use, you can contact us. We will provide you with professional services on the product.

Flip-Up Armrest

Padded flip-up armrests provide a soft support and allow you to make the most of your space.

Rocking Function

Chair can be rocked front and back about 25 degree, you can have a leisurely break while sit on the chair.

Comfortable Cushion

The double-layer cushion consists of polypropylene cotton and native sponge, relieve the pain from long time sitting.

Read more

PU-leather ergonomic office chair

About this chair

An Executive chair with a high-back features a PU leather exterior to provide a timeless style that fits in nearly any room. Pneumatic, seat-height adjustment allows a variety of users to sit comfortably at their desks. 360-degree swivel allows you to effortlessly rotate the chair for added convenience.

Product description

  • Adjustable height
  • Flip-up arms
  • 360 degree swivel
  • Double layer support
  • High-end soft Pu leather

For different occassions:

  • Bedrooms
  • Office
  • Study room
  • Meeting room
  • Conference room

Read more

4

(as of Nov 30,2022 11:08:50 UTC – Details)

Series E I Office Desk Chair

Series J I Office Desk Chair

Home Office Desk Chair – Sleek design and simple adjustment mid-back desk chair. Match different decorative styles. Ergonomic backrest fit the natural curve of the lower back and take the pain of spinal away from your body
Space Saving – You can flip the arms up and put the chair under the desk for saving space.Suitable for livingroom, study room, conference room and office
Breathable – High density mesh back, flexible supportive, breathable. Designed to support your lower back
Adjustable – Hbada home office task chair has a 120° tilt tension, pneumatic height adjustable from 16.5 inch to 19.5 inch, match different stature. Weight capacity: 250lb.
Stable & durable: Heavy duty base with smooth and silenced rolling casters, Max Capacity 250lbs

Warranty & Support

Amazon.com Return Policy:You may return any new computer purchased from Amazon.com that is “dead on arrival,” arrives in damaged condition, or is still in unopened boxes, for a full refund within 30 days of purchase. Amazon.com reserves the right to test “dead on arrival” returns and impose a customer fee equal to 15 percent of the product sales price if the customer misrepresents the condition of the product. Any returned computer that is damaged through customer misuse, is missing parts, or is in unsellable condition due to customer tampering will result in the customer being charged a higher restocking fee based on the condition of the product. Amazon.com will not accept returns of any desktop or notebook computer more than 30 days after you receive the shipment. New, used, and refurbished products purchased from Marketplace vendors are subject to the returns policy of the individual vendor.

Product Description

Why choose WALI? WALI is committed to building high-quality products and mounting solutions for every budget and everyone. From monitor mounts to speaker mounts and projector mounts, our collections achieve the optimal balance between functionality, design, and aesthetics.

STT003

Monitor Stand Riser

What benefits can we get from WALI monitor stand riser?

To create a comfortable viewing position and better healthy posture.

Give more valuable desktop space underneath the stand for storage.

Design: Large 14.6 x 9.3 inches durable metal shelf fit most flat screen display, laptop and printer, maximum support weight up to 44lbs (20kg). Anti-skid rubber pads prevent slipping or damage to your work surface.
Ergonomic: Raise computer monitor, notebook or any device by 3.9 inches, 4.7 inches or 5.5 inches off the desk to create a comfortable viewing position and a healthier sitting position which help reduce stress on the neck and back.
Ventilated: Large sturdy platform with vented holes, this stand will prevent overheating and keep the device running cool.
Organization: Sleek modern black design complements any desk while adding extra space underneath the stand for storage.
Package Includes: WALI 3 Height Adjustable Metal Monitor Stand Riser x 1, experienced and friendly US based customer support available to assist 7 days a week.

item.content:encoded:
Price: $34.99
(as of Nov 30,2022 05:07:36 UTC – Details)

From the brand

Ergonomic Benefits

Look no further than our HUANUO adjustable footrest! Whether you’re at work or at home, you can enjoy some nice relaxation!

HUANUO Foot Rest

Enjoy the feeling of relaxation at any time.

HUANUO Hot New Releases

HUANUO Office Chair&Organizer

Is Discontinued By Manufacturer ‏ : ‎ No
Package Dimensions ‏ : ‎ 17.4 x 13.27 x 4.41 inches; 4.63 Pounds
Item model number ‏ : ‎ HNFR3
Date First Available ‏ : ‎ April 24, 2019
Manufacturer ‏ : ‎ HUANUO
ASIN ‏ : ‎ B07L3RVF7C
Country of Origin ‏ : ‎ China

Adjustable Height – Height is manually adjustable to 3 different positions: 4.3″ , 5.5 “, 6.7” (11cm/14 cm/17cm). Super easy for you to find the perfect position to suit your needs
Easy Angle Adjustment – Tilts -30°- +30°to support your legs at your preferred angle. The Angle can’t be fixed, it rocks back and forth which encourages leg movement
Massage Textured Surface – Comes with a large non-skid surface (18″ X 13″), free-floating platform texture made up of geometric circular bumps for enhanced stress reduction during the work day. Perfect for office and home use
Pre-Assembled For Use- This adjustable foot rest is pre-assembled for immediate use. Non slip feet enhances overall stability. Sturdy construction offer you comfortable experience while you’re working or studying

Look no further than our HUANUO adjustable footrest! Whether you're at work or at home, you can enjoy some nice relaxation!

Ergonomic Benefits

Great foot rest for working at a computer. Comes with the adjustability for your desired height. Features a free-floating platform that tilts back and forth which encourages full leg stretches and lower-leg movement, and helps minimize fatigue and increase circulation, which is important when sitting for long periods of time.

Adjustable Rest Angles

HUANUO footrest tilts from -30° to +30°, allowing you to find the most comfortable angle for you to improve your posture and reduce physical stress.

Adjustable Rest Angles

HUANUO footrest tilts from -30° to +30°, allowing you to find the most comfortable angle for you to improve your posture and reduce physical stress.

Adjustable Rest Angles

HUANUO footrest tilts from -30° to +30°, allowing you to find the most comfortable angle for you to improve your posture and reduce physical stress.

Multi-Position Design

The HUANUO foot rest offers 3 adjustable height positions. It supports better posture and reduces physical stress. Being completely adjustable to multiple tilt angles and height settings. It allows you to find what is just right for you to relax comfortably.

Multi-Position Design

The HUANUO foot rest offers 3 adjustable height positions. Choose the proper height for you to to relax comfortably.

Adjustable Heights

The HUANUO foot rest offers 3 adjustable height positions. Choose the proper height for you to to relax comfortably.

Textured Surface

This foot rest comes with a textured surface made up of geometric circular bumps for enhanced stress reduction during the work day. When barefoot or wearing socks, the uneven surface creates a massaging effect on the soles of feet. Simply move your feet in any direction over the bumpy surface.

Read more

Fully Assembled

Flat design for easy storage. Comes fully assembled which makes it ready for immediate use out of box. Non slip feet enhance stress reduction and overall stability.

Read more

Adjustable Foot Rest with Massage Texture and Roller

Under Desk Foot Rest - Ergonomic Footrest
Airplane Footrest with Premium Memory Foam
Adjustable Foot Rest with Massage

item.title: KEEN Men’s Targhee 3 Mid Height Waterproof Hiking Boot
item.dc:creator: admin
item.description: Price: (as of – Details) Our iconic hiking shoe for men brings an updated look to all-terrain adventures. We carried over the fit, durability, and performance of our award-winning Targhee waterproof boot and took its rugged looks to a new dimension. Weighing 15.87 oz / 499.9 g (per shoe), made with durable, waterproof leather and ... Read more
item.content:encoded:
Price: $89.84
(as of Nov 30,2022 04:43:57 UTC – Details)


Our iconic hiking shoe for men brings an updated look to all-terrain adventures. We carried over the fit, durability, and performance of our award-winning Targhee waterproof boot and took its rugged looks to a new dimension. Weighing 15.87 oz / 499.9 g (per shoe), made with durable, waterproof leather and featuring a moisture-wicking lining, the KEEN Men’s Targhee 3 Mid Height Waterproof Hiking Boot is built off KEEN’s traditional wider footwear form. KEEN products are consciously created using a natural, pesticide-free probiotic-based technology called Eco Anti-Odor for breaking down odor in sweat, PFC-free water repellent (in applicable styles) and leather sourced from Leather Working Group (LWG)-certified tanneries. KEEN makes shoes to make a difference. From the products it makes, to the actions the it takes, KEEN inspires people to live and work monumental every day. As a brand born for life outside, KEEN has a responsibility to protect and conserve the places where all people live, play and work.
Is Discontinued By Manufacturer ‏ : ‎ No
Product Dimensions ‏ : ‎ 0.39 x 0.39 x 0.39 inches; 1.14 Pounds
Item model number ‏ : ‎ 1017787
Date First Available ‏ : ‎ January 11, 2018
Manufacturer ‏ : ‎ Keen Adults – US SHOES
ASIN ‏ : ‎ B01N120SDH

Imported
Shaft measures approximately Ankle from arch
WATERPROOF: KEEN.DRY waterproof breathable membrane keeps your feet dry and comfortable all day long by allowing vapor out without letting water in
TRACTION: KEEN ALL-TERRAIN rubber outsole provides high traction grip in muddy environments and on rocky surfaces; Non marking rubber outsoles leaves no trace or imprints when walking indoors
SUPPORT: External Support Shank and mid cut height adds ankle support and balance on uneven surfaces; Contoured heel provides next level stability
FIT: Mid profile upper for comfort and secure fit with padded tongue and collar
COMFORT: Removable metatomical footbed design provides excellent arch support and cradles to the natural contours of the foot

Read more

Read more

Read more

PFC-Free Construction

  • PFCs (perfluorinated chemicals) are used everywhere in the outdoor industry.
  • They create a dense coating on fabrics; water beads up instead of soaking in.
  • They’re durable, and they do a good job. However, they’re also suspected carcinogens and break down very slowly.

Breathable Mesh

  • Heat has met its mesh.
  • Breeze through the heat with a lightweight performance mesh upper, mesh panels, and a breathable mesh lining, all designed to keep feet cool.

KEEN.DRY Waterproof

  • Don’t sweat the tough stuff.
  • Push your limits with the help of KEEN.DRY, a waterproof, breathable membrane that lets vapor out without letting water in.

Read more

COMFORT Removable metatomical dual density EVA footbed Removable PU footbed with arch support for long-lasting comfort Vented to keep warm feet happy Removable EVA footbed with arch support for all-day comfort Removable EVA footbed with arch support for all-day comfort Vented to keep warm feet happy

Franklin Sports MLB Electronic Baseball Pitching Machine – Height Adjustable – Ball Pitches Every 7 Seconds
7 SECOND PITCHES: This electronic pitching machine for kids is a great way to encourage them to practice batting skills; The ball pitches every 7 seconds for improved accuracy and precision on the field; Assembled height 7.75 x 9.5 x 9.875 inches
FLASHING LIGHT INDICATOR: A flashing red indicator light shows when the ball pitches, making it easy to prepare in your baseball stance; You get all the fun of a batting cage right in the comfort of your own backyard
ANGLE ADJUSTMENTS: The angle of your pitch is adjustable, making it a perfect training tool for developing young athletes; Perfect for practicing multiple batting angles and pitch styles!
SIX BALLS INCLUDED: This batting machine includes six white aero strike baseballs; You should not use regulation baseballs or tee balls with this baseball machine – only use the balls included; The ball shoot can hold up to 9 balls
IMPROVE BATTING PERFORMANCE: Your child should ideally use a plastic baseball bat with this pitching machine; There’s no better kids’ baseball pitching machine to help grow and improve your batting skills!

From the brand

About HISEA:

HISEA is a company specializing in the production of outdoor wear. In order to produce perfect outdoor products, HISEA strives to make every detail of each product take into account your needs.

Women’s Waterproof Rain Boots

Men’s Waterproof Rain Boots

What problem are we solving?

We are a global brand. Our mission and purpose that guides us in everything we do is to resolve the problem of people’s necessities for work and life, defense against outdoor elements, inspire the dream of a better life for you.

What makes our products unique?

Our products are versatile and functional, easy to take care of. All kinds of products are ranged from men, women to children.

HISEA pre sales & after sales servie?

We love our customers; we provide 24h free contact service and a lifetime quality response of our products.

HISEA Rubber Rain Boots

100% WaterproofInsulatedFlexible

Women’s EVA Hunting boots

Men’s Rubber Rain Boots

Package Dimensions ‏ : ‎ 13.94 x 12.71 x 4.8 inches; 2.8 Pounds
Date First Available ‏ : ‎ June 15, 2020
Manufacturer ‏ : ‎ OneStone
ASIN ‏ : ‎ B08B5S8RSS

HISEA women’s garden boots give outdoors lovers all the lightweight performance and 100% waterproof protection. They are designed to be one of the most VERSATILE STYLES, an ideal for where there is mud, slush or rain.
These women’s gardening boots provide 100% Waterproof. 5mm four-way stretch nylon flex-foam boots and high-grade rubber overlays keep feet dry and warm, and providing comfort and support for long time standing.
Lightweight, breathable 2mm H-Airmesh lining allows the air to travel throughout the boots, which keeps your feet much dryer than normal boots. The air mesh is what keeps high-end running shoes cool and dry under intense use. Comfort rated from subfreezing temperatures to 86 °F/30 °C. Best for year-round use.
Roll them down to let inner delicate floral printing outside, they become shoes immediately! These superior boots offer all day comfort wherever you go, they are features an aggressive non-slip sole, shedding debris easily. A removable molded EVA sock liner and reinforced rubber shell provide additional protection to achilles, heel and toe.
PLEASE MIND THE SIZE CHART AND CHOOSE THE RIGHT SIZE BEFORE BUYING! We love our buyers; Boots come with a FREE gift. One Year Quality Assurance Backed By HISEA!

5 mm neoprene upper keeps you warm & comfortable.

Warranty & Support

Price: $69.99 - $47.99
(as of Nov 29,2022 01:46:47 UTC – Details)

Product Description

The Heart of Hydroponics

The pump is to hydroponics what the heart is to humans, QYO’s water circulation system pumps the oxygen and nutrients to your plants dynamically while making no more noise than a whisper.

Changing Water Is A Breeze

Thanks to the QYO patented drainage hole on the back of the hydroponic growing system, changing the water and cleaning the tank will no longer be a hassle for you.

Watering, Less of A Question Mark.

Forget the worries of under or overwatering, the water level gauge shows the amount of water in the tank at a glance.

Farm Your Imagination

Don’t just stop at strawberries, lettuce, arugula, endive, spinach and spices, QYO hydroponic garden with 19.7inch extandable rod so you can grow even bigger palnts like peppers, tomatoes, cucumbers, peas, rosemary, basil and more.

Better Light, Faster Growth: Adapting the newest SMD LED technology with full-spectrum light technique, QYO’s 70 LED 24W grow light delivers all the wavelengths needed for plant growth. The Hydroponics Herb Garden’s SMD LED grow light delivers 30% more luminous flux than traditional grow light for plants to maximize photosynthesis and speed up growth by 5x, while it also creates a perfect temperature, allowing plants to germinate and grow quickly, even in winter.
Quiet Auto Water Circulation System: Advanced Deep Flow Technique is applied for the hydroponic garden, professional water pump runs every 30 minutes to generate a regular water flow, creating a perfect ecosystem for roots. In this technique, oxygen and nutrients are better delivered to the roots, allowing plants to grow faster and healthier. The water pump also keeps the water fresh and clean while operating with extremely low noise.
Free from Constant Watering: Surprise yourself with 18 days of self-sufficient growth in just 1 watering, guaranteed by Indoor Garden’s 4.5L ultra-large water tank and exclusive formula nutrients. Its unique deeper tank provides larger space for roots to develop and breath, while the escalated plant foods provide all the nutrients plants need and improve the water quality to keep plants fresh. With its water level gauge, you can know at a glance when to add water.
Grow All You Want: Don’t just stop at strawberry, with the 19.7inch extendable rod, 9 planting pods and two growing modes, you can grow even taller and larger plants in our Indoor Herb Garden, including pepper, tomato, cucumber, pea, rosemary, basil, lettuce, arugula, endive, spinach, spice, oregano, parsley, harvest chervil and more. Grow ANYTHING you love with our indoor garden even in bitterly cold winter and in apartments without ample sunlight.
68 In 1 Pack: All you need included: Hydroponics System x1, sponge x 18, rod x 9, tag x 9, seedling dome x 9, basket x 9, pod label x 9, solid nutrients x 2, AC/DC adapter x1, manual x 1. This indoor garden comes with a 365 day warranty, any questions about our products, or need any technical support, we will resolve them within 24 hours.

The Heart of Hydroponics

The pump is to hydroponics what the heart is to humans, QYO's water circulation system pumps the oxygen and nutrients to your plants dynamically while making no more noise than a whisper.

Changing Water Is A Breeze

Thanks to the QYO patented drainage hole on the back of the hydroponic growing system, changing the water and cleaning the tank will no longer be a hassle for you.

Watering, Less of A Question Mark.

Forget the worries of under or overwatering, the water level gauge shows the amount of water in the tank at a glance.

Farm Your Imagination

Don't just stop at strawberries, lettuce, arugula, endive, spinach and spices, QYO hydroponic garden with 19.7inch extandable rod so you can grow even bigger palnts like peppers, tomatoes, cucumbers, peas, rosemary, basil and more.
